Create a "Smart" Post-It Notes: Develop a post-it note that can be scanned and turned into a digital note in a smartphone or computer.
ityity Post-It Notes: Create a line of post-it notes that are made of recycled materials and have a unique eco-friendly feature.
Augmented Reality Post-Itity Post-It Notes: Develop a line of post-it notes that have an augmented reality feature that can be accessed using a smartphone or tablet.
Transparent Post-It Notes: Create a line of post-it notes that are made of transparent material, making them less visible and allowing for more creativity in note-taking.
Voice-Activated Post-It Notes: Develop a line of post-it notes that can be activated using voice commands, allowing for hands-free note-taking.
